price: àwọn (òǹtajà) tó jẹ́ pé nígbà tí wọ́n bá wọn n̄ǹkan lọ́dọ̀ àwọn ènìyàn,¹ wọ́n á gbà á ní ẹ̀kún,
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ
footnotes: 1. “Àwọn ènìyàn” ní àyè yìí dúró fún bíi “ àwọn olóko”.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna idhā ik'tālū ʿalā al-nāsi yastawfūna
